Objective: BP: 120/80. HR: 70. Temp: 36.8Â°C. Back: normal. Legs: normal. Strength: normal. Reflexes: normal. Pregabalin prescribed.
Assessment: Lumbosacral radicular syndrome, susp. HNP. No signs of cauda equina.

Follow-up in 1 week to discuss pain relief.
Contact doctor if symptoms worsen (e.g. no feeling in riding breeches area, no strength in leg).
